billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Prohibits the sale of mature and violent video games to minors
summary: Prohibits the sale to minors of certain rated video games containing a rating that reflects content of various degrees of profanity, racist stereotypes or derogatory language, and/or actions toward a specific group of persons.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting sale of certain video games to minors
